Brand: Earthen

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Simmondsia, Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, Resveratrol, Sodium Polyacrylate

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, De
ons; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
